definition: to scald/to burn (by scalding)/to blanch (cooking)/to heat (sth) up in hot water/to perm/to iron/scalding hot
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: The wrinkled silk will flatten out if you iron it.
sentences.chinese: 發皺的絲綢可以用熨斗燙平。

sentences.english: It took a long time to iron out all the creases in this dress.
sentences.chinese: 燙平這件衣服上的皺痕花了很長時間。

sentences.english: It is the commitment of central bank to smooth the volatility of the foreign exchange market in the short interval.
sentences.chinese: 燙平短期匯市劇烈波動是中央銀行的職責。

sentences.english: Will you iron out the wrinkles in this skirt?
sentences.chinese: 能否幫我燙平這個裙子嗎？

sentences.english: She smoothed the creases out with an electric iron .
sentences.chinese: 她用電熨斗把皺褶燙平。

sentences.english: He likes smoothing down his shirt before wearing it.
sentences.chinese: 他喜歡穿襯衣物前把它燙平。

sentences.english: I want my trousers (to be) ironed out.
sentences.chinese: 我希望把我的褲子燙平。

sentences.english: Please smooth this dress with a hot iron.
sentences.chinese: 請用一個熱的熨斗燙平這件衣服。

sentences.english: The machine can easily reach the wrinkled position that cannot be reached by common iron.
sentences.chinese: 能輕易的吹挺一般熨斗不能燙平的鄒疊部位。

sentences.english: I've got to get this shirt washed and ironed.
sentences.chinese: 我這些襯衫和長褲要乾洗和燙平。

sentences.english: This garment should be put on after being ironed by an electric iron.
sentences.chinese: 這件衣服應該用電熨斗燙平後再穿。
這件絲綢連衣裙很容易燙平。

sentences.english: Spray it a little wet may help ironing out the wrinkles.
sentences.chinese: 熨燙時，可適量噴溼，易於燙平。

sentences.english: Will you iron out the wrinkles in the skirt?
sentences.chinese: 沒出國疑問幫我把這件裙子燙平嗎？
